findings.title: OCTD - Transfers Contract's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to claim all the balance of the contract.

findings.title: ZD - Zero Division
findings.description: The contract is using variables that may be set to zero as denominators.

findings.title: DDP - Decimal Division Precision
findings.description: Division of decimal (fixed point) numbers can result in rounding errors.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are a way to record and log information about changes or actions that occur within a contract.

findings.title: L12 - Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: The contract is using a variable before the declaration.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured on user-supplied input without proper checks.
